name: Kirsty's Gallery
description:
A group project, put together by people all over the world to celebrate the birthday of a dear friend. <3

Mouse and WADS to move around. Left click to interact. ESC to quit.

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/light-rising/a-box-of-delights

Programming by Lewis Walton.
Some art and text contributed by: 
https://www.instagram.com/icedcoffeecatstudios/

https://www.instagram.com/mattman_s/
